name: MetaFilter: Signika / Open Sans restyle
description: Changes Source Sans Pro to Open Sans and Montserrat to Signika, along with a good few other readability fixes. Also adds scanlines back to the header. I strongly recommend using this in conjunction with my fix to remove byline shading and indentation. Works in both light and dark mode. You will need to install the fonts Signika and Open Sans, or change them in the CSS to something else.
